mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeBoard(freePostNum, userId, subject, content, views, groupNum, depth, orderNo, parent) VALUES (#{freePostNum}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{views}, #{groupNum}, #{depth}, #{orderNo}, #{parent})
mapper.update: UPDATE freeBoard SET orderNo=orderNo+1 WHERE groupNum=#{groupNum} AND orderNo > #{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM freeBoard f JOIN memberInfo m ON f.userId=m.userId

SELECT freePostNum, f.userId, nickName, subject, DATE_FORMAT(f.created, '%Y-%m-%d') created , views, f.created, depth, groupNum, orderNo FROM freeBoard f JOIN memberInfo m ON f.userId=m.userId
ORDER BY groupNum DESC, orderNo ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
SELECT freePostNum, f.userId, nickName, subject, content, f.created, views, groupNum, orderNo, depth, parent FROM freeBoard f JOIN memberInfo m ON f.userId=m.userId WHERE freePostNum=#{freePostNum}

SELECT freePostNum, subject FROM freeBoard f JOIN memberInfo m ON f.userId=m.userId
AND ((groupNum = #{groupNum} AND orderNo < #{orderNo}) OR (groupNum > #{groupNum} ))
ORDER BY groupNum ASC, orderNo DESC LIMIT 1

UPDATE freeBoard SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE freePostNum = #{freePostNum} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT freePostnum, depth, orderNo FROM freeBoard WHERE groupNum = (SELECT groupNum FROM freeBoard WHERE freePostNum=#{freePostNum}) AND orderNo >= (SELECT orderNo FROM freeBoard WHERE freePostNum=#{freePostNum}) ORDER BY orderNo ASC
